gco:CharacterString.#text: SNO H+ : Monitoring of all water cycle components and characterization of subsurface hydraulic properties on the Poitiers site starting from 1991.
Available data include monitoring data (weather parameters,piezometric levels and pumping flow rates).
The hydrologic and climatic monitoring is designed to quantify and model the transfer of water.
Continents, countries, sea regions of the world
Access and use of H+ data policy are subject to H+ data policy
please see the agreements on H+ web site
Ask for the supplier for the accuracy
integrity and completeness of the data. Access and use of H+ data policy are subject to H+ data policy
